thread.title: Perfect hotel during fashion week
thread.title_full: Perfect hotel during fashion week - Review of Sofitel Paris Le Faubourg, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Iloveboutiquehotels
title: Perfect hotel during fashion week
text:
This hotel is located on the best part of Faubourg Saint-Honore, right across from Buddha Bar and steps away from Hermes and all the best high end shopping Paris has to offer. There is tight security to enter the street because it is near the US Embassy, I recommend if you arrive by taxi to have your hotel confirmation letter handy.
The arrival experience was quite lovely, there were a selection of infused water available. Vintage couture gowns were decorated all around the lobby and reception area, quite fitting for the fashionable locale.
The room was very chic and stylish, modern technology where you need it like a USB port near the desk as well as a power outlet at 110V for North Americans.
The bathroom was also stylish, Hermes amenities, double sink, a large walk-in shower with rain shower head, separate deep soaker tub. The lighting is a little dark for ladies who want to apply precision make up.
Breakfast buffet was extensive, great selection and fantastic quality.
